price: Odoo isaan rafanuu, naanna'aan (adabbiin) Rabbii kee biraa ta'e ishee irra naanna'e.
arabic: فَطَافَ عَلَيۡهَا طَآئِفٞ مِّن رَّبِّكَ وَهُمۡ نَآئِمُونَ

version.title: Oromo translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Oromo by Ghaly Ababour Abaghuna, printed in 2009.

meta.transliteration: faṭāfa ʿalayhā ṭāifun min rabbika wahum nāimūna
